channel.title: Nardah 2.0 - It begins.. [Soul Wars, Barb. Assault - 317]
channel.description:
[CENTER][SIZE=5]Nardah 2.0 - It begins..[/SIZE]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Ey6xyvE.png[/img]
[B]Soul Wars event[/B]
An open Soul Wars event will be held in a few days where everyone can come and join and play the minigame with us. If you're interested, leave a comment; "Applying for Soul Wars testing" or with anything similar to let us know.
[IMG]http://puu.sh/6qIG4.jpg[/img]
[SIZE=4]Introduction[/SIZE]
Nardah was originally started by Infexis earlier this year and has gained reputation by it's content. Now we strive for a enjoyable server and gameplay for everyone as the project continues it's development. The source is originally based on Project Insanity, sadly. Our other main goals are to keep the code neat and clean as possible for the source together with creating a lot of unique content along with a stable server.[/CENTER]
[SIZE=4]Developers[/SIZE]
[ul][*]Infexis [*]Stand Up[/ul]
[SIZE=4]Updates & features[/SIZE]
[B][SIZE=2]Thread key[/SIZE][/B]
Green - Completed & no more work to be done Orange - Under development Red - Not started yet, to come soon
[B][SIZE=2]Minigames[/SIZE][/B]
[ul][*]Pyramid Plunder [*]Fist of Guthix [*]Clan Wars [*]Barrows [*]Barbarian Assault
[*]Bounty Hunter [*]Pest Control [*]Castle Wars [list] [*]Waiting rooms [*]Tools & barricades [*]Standards [/list]
[*]Duel Arena [*]Soul Wars [list] [*]Requirements [*]Waiting rooms [*]Supply areas [*]Death and graveyards [*]Objectives and avatars [*]Rewards [*]Interfaces [/list]
[*]Warriors Guild[/ul]
[B][SIZE=2]Skills[/SIZE][/B]
[ul][*]Prayer [list] [*]All bones are buryable [*]Bone on altar [/list]
[*]Runecrafting [list] [*]All altars can be used according to RSWiki [*]Runecrafting pouches can store both Rune as Pure essence at the same time [*]Use of the abyss [/list] [*]Construction [*]Agility [list] [*]Shortcuts System [*]Gnome Agility Course [*]Wilderness Agility Course [*]Barbarian Outpost Agility Course [/list] [*]Herblore [list] [*]All Unfinished Potions listed by RSWiki [*]All Finished Potions listed by RSWiki [*]All grindables listed by RSWiki [/list] [*]Thieving [*]Crafting [*]Fletching [list] [*]Arrow/Bolt fletching [*]Crossbow/Shortbow/Longbow/Shaft fletching [*]Interface ( Create 5 / 10 / 15 etc. ) [/list] [*]Slayer [*]Hunter [list] [*]Butterflies and implings [*]Falconry [*]Traps and others [/list]
[*]Mining [list] [*]Ore mining formula [*]Depleting Rocks [*]Ore prospecting [*]Rune/Pure Essence support [/list]
[*]Smithing [*]Fishing [list] [*]Correct timers and requirements [*]All fishes are fishable [*]Spot respawning and events [/list]
[*]Cooking [list] [*]Correct requirements and timers [*]Perfect formulas [*]All fishes are cookable [*]Misc food - pies, pizzas, bowls etc. [/list]
[*]Firemaking [*]Woodcutting [*]Farming [*]Summoning[/ul]
[B][SIZE=2]Guilds[/SIZE][/B]
[ul][*]Champions' Guild [*]Cooks' Guild [*]Crafting Guild [*]Fishing Guild [*]Heroes' Guild [*]Legends' Guild [*]Mining Guild [*]Monastery [*]Ranging Guild [*]Runecrafting Guild [*]Warriors' Guild [*]Wizards' Guild[/ul]
[SIZE=4]Media[/SIZE]
[SPOILER="Overall Media"]More to come..[/SPOILER]
Soul Wars interfaces, waiting lobby and minigame
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/c7Oq1SU.png[/img]
Re-spawning as ghost for 15 seconds
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/uX15SNo.png[/img]
Slayer requirement, hitpoint percentage and fighting the opponents avatar
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/fNStM2i.png[/img]
Barbarian Assault interfaces
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/R2OCGf1.png[/img]
Second interface
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/HHKwqkj.png[/img]

item.description:
@NardahRSPS wrote:

[CENTER][SIZE=5]Nardah 2.0 - It begins…[/SIZE]

[B]Soul Wars event[/B]

An open Soul Wars event will be held in a few days where everyone can come and join and play the minigame with us. If you’re interested, leave a comment; “Applying for Soul Wars testing” or with anything similar to let us know.

[SIZE=4]Introduction[/SIZE]

Nardah was originally started by Infexis earlier this year and has gained reputation by it’s content. Now we strive for a enjoyable server and gameplay for everyone as the project continues it’s development. The source is originally based on Project Insanity, sadly. Our other main goals are to keep the code neat and clean as possible for the source together with creating a lot of unique content along with a stable server.[/CENTER]
